Line1.EECAE: Rumor has it, the Overseer who first owned it was a man consumed by jealousy. His partners feared him more than loved him.
Line3.EECAE: But I hear his daughter was even worse.
Line5.EECAE: I'll know more for sure once you've retrieved the cleaver.
VoiceDir1.EECAE: As if sharing a secret; spooky and foreshadowing
